test.name: Testar Adicao Com Valores Positivos

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: exexcutable_path is being deprecated. Please use service to configure the driver's executable_path as per documentation.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'name=operation' by value add.
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Testar a funcionalidade de adição com valores positivos na calculadora

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.msg: ${erro} = Erro: Divisão por zero não é permitida.

kw.arg: Erro: Divisão por zero não é permitida.
